channel.title: Law School TA
channel.itunes:author: Kasey Baughan
channel.description:
Stanford Law graduate Kasey Baughan takes you through the first year of law school. We will start with a brief overview of the US legal system, and then move to contract law, tort law, criminal law, and the other subjects you'd typically cover in the first year of law school.
Join our PodTalk Section 3 group at https://podtalk.app/join_group?u=podtalk://join/group:97

item.title: The Constitution, Statutes, and Common Law
item.itunes:title: The Constitution, Statutes, and Common Law
item.description:
The basic hierarchy of laws starts with Consitutional Law, and works its way down to the Common Law. This is important background knowledge to have before we begin studying case law.

Join our PodTalk Section 3 group at https://podtalk.app/join_group?u=podtalk://join/group:97

item.title: Intro
item.itunes:title: Intro
item.description:
Meet the host and find out what this podcast is all about.
